message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the true value this product offers.  Would you consider meeting me halfway at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. Would you be willing to consider $11,500?
